Name: Pester
About the game: Pester was released on Xbox live indies back in early 2013 and was Flump Studios first game developed for public release. A remake of one of my early C64 games, Pester is a very fast paced and busy vertical shooter. Graphically remastered with new sprite work from Dylan Barry and a thumping soundtrack from Matt Macfarland. Intense old school action Tate support Customisable play options, over 100 combinations of play Remastered sprite work from Dylan Barry Thumping soundtrack from Matt Macfarland
